member.name: P:OpenXNet.Banner.Weight
member.summary: priority weight of the banner

member.name: P:OpenXNet.Banner.Block
member.summary: Frequency capping: reset period, in seconds.

member.name: P:OpenXNet.Banner.Capping
member.summary: Frequency capping: total views per user.

member.name: P:OpenXNet.Banner.SessionCapping
member.summary: Frequency capping: total views per period.

member.name: P:OpenXNet.Banner.CampaignId
member.summary: ID of the campaign to associate with the banner

member.name: P:OpenXNet.Banner.BackupImages
member.summary: Backup image name and binary data in case the primary image is a swf file

member.name: P:OpenXNet.Banner.AdServer
member.summary: A text field for HTML banners to indicate which adserver this ad is from

member.name: P:OpenXNet.Banner.Alt
member.summary: Provides the alt value for SQL/Web/External banners.

member.name: P:OpenXNet.Banner.ImageUrl
member.summary: This field provides the URL for the image file for an external banner.

member.name: P:OpenXNet.Banner.Status
member.summary: Indicate if the banner is active

member.name: P:OpenXNet.Banner.Target
member.summary: HTML target of the banner (e.g. _blank, _self)

member.name: P:OpenXNet.Banner.StorageType
member.summary: Storage type for the banner, which is one of 'sql','web','url','html','txt'.

member.name: P:OpenXNet.Banner.Transparent
member.summary: Transparency information for SWF banners

member.name: P:OpenXNet.Banner.Url
member.summary: Destination URL of the banner.

member.name: P:OpenXNet.BannerTargeting.Logical
member.summary: Logical operator: 'and' or 'or'

member.name: P:OpenXNet.BannerTargeting.Type
member.summary: Which targeting plugin this rule uses. e.g. 'Site:Pageurl'

member.name: P:OpenXNet.BannerTargeting.Comparison
member.summary: Which operation to apply to the data in order to determine if a rule passes or fails. e.g. '==', '!='

member.name: P:OpenXNet.BannerTargeting.Data
member.summary: Actual data to be targeted. Since this is specific to the individual plugin it is fairly free-form.

member.name: P:OpenXNet.Campaign.Block
member.summary: Frequency capping: reset period, in seconds.

member.name: P:OpenXNet.Campaign.Capping
member.summary: Frequency capping: total views per user.

member.name: P:OpenXNet.Campaign.Clicks
member.summary: Number of clicks booked for the campaign.

member.name: P:OpenXNet.Campaign.Impressions
member.summary: Number of impressions booked for the campaign.

member.name: P:OpenXNet.Campaign.Priority
member.summary: Priority level for the campaign

member.name: P:OpenXNet.Campaign.RevenueType
member.summary: Revenue type (CPM, CPA, etc)

member.name: P:OpenXNet.Campaign.SessionCapping
member.summary: Frequency capping: total views per period (defined in seconds by "block").

member.name: P:OpenXNet.Campaign.Weight
member.summary: Priority weight of this campaign

member.summary: Sets banner targeting information See https://developer.openx.org/wiki/display/API/OpenX+API+Targeting

member.name: F:OpenXNet.RevenueType.CPC
